description: ROCKY HILL, Conn. (AP) _ The winning numbers in Saturday afternoon's drawing of the Connecticut Lottery's "Play3 Day" game were: 2-4-8 (two, four, eight)
title: Winning numbers drawn in 'Play3 Day' game
title_page: Winning numbers drawn in 'Play3 Day' game
maintext:
ROCKY HILL, Conn. (AP) _ The winning numbers in Saturday afternoon’s drawing of the Connecticut Lottery’s “Play3 Day” game were:
2-4-8
(two, four, eight)
